Package frc.robot.subsystems

Class Hopper

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.SubsystemBase
      • frc.robot.subsystems.Hopper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.Sendable, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Subsystem
    public class Hopper
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.SubsystemBase
    The hopper subsystem that can be put on shuffleboard. contains two motors that run in opposite directions. Because build is un-organized the right wheel is geared 1/4 of the left wheel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected com.ctre.phoenix.motorcontrol.can.WPI_TalonSRX m_leftWheel
      The left motor's controller for the hopper
      protected com.ctre.phoenix.motorcontrol.can.WPI_TalonSRX m_rightWheel
      The right motor's controller for the hopper

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Hopper()
      Constructs a hopper with 9 volts of voltage compensation on the motors.
